name: dizmo
0:
”Alexa ask dizmo to pair with PERFUME FARMER.”
”Alexa ask dizmo to start.”
”Alexa ask dizmo to unpair from PERFUME FARMER.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: dizmo
Developer Terms of Use
des: The dizmo skill allows to send voice commands to the dizmo software, where an Alexa control dizmo receives the incoming requests such as "Start", "Done" or "Finish", where the latter one can have an optional ordinal number associated with. The control dizmo forwards then the incoming commands to other docked (i.e. connected) dizmos. The dizmo software can be acquired from www.dizmo.com/product/.
